Domaincer Inc.

Junior Full Stack Developer
Chennai, India

Description

Domaincer® is a prestigious digital agency with 12 years of experience. It is a subsidiary of ShootUp Technologies Private Limited. Domaincer® empowers digital through creative, strategic & ROI driven solutions.

Domaincer® is a premium digital agency that focuses on quality, innovation, & speed providing a suite of service ranging from branding, development to marketing. Throughout the years, Domaincer® has been able to create stunning, award-winning designs in multiple verticals allowing our clients to obtain an overall better web presence.

Company Details:

  • https://domaincer.com/
  • tel:+918190007007
  • Information Technology & Services
  • 11-50 employees
  • Privately Held
  • 2008

Requirements

  • 0-2 years of JavaScript (Full-Stack or Backend) Development experience
  • Strong knowledge in Backend - Node JS
  • Strong knowledge of HTML5 & CSS3
  • Experience using git - Have a public GitHub account with Javascript/Web projects.
  • Interfacing with DB like MySQL, MongoDB

Nice to Haves

  • Js Frameworks - React, Angular, Vue

    • Job Perks

  • Opportunity to work in one of coolest offices in Chennai

  • Great work culture
  • Monthly Extra Miler Recognition for 2(Gold Coin), Bonus & chill dinners.
  • Complimentary Health Insurance for 5 Lakhs
